text: José Fernando Sardina Santiago (born September 16, 1970 in Brañosera, Palencia) is a goalball athlete from Spain. He has a disability: he is blind and is a B2 type player. He played goalball at the 1996 Summer Paralympics. His team was third. == References == Category:Spanish goalball players Category:Living people Category:1970 births Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:People from Castile and León Category:1996 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type B2
title: José Fernando Sardina Santiago
